name: Air Traffic Internship
description:
Air Traffic Internship was created within 48 hours for the BeansJam '22.

Welcome to your internship as an air traffic controller! 
Guide airplanes to take the right route to avoid collision. Drink coffee to stay awake.
Can you complete all ten days of your internship?

Game Design, Level Design, Art and Animation: Julia Keppler
Game Design and Coding: Bastian Baier

Created in HTML/Javascript

Play with sound for a better experience
Background sound: klankbeeld
